===The Sitemap system===
===The Sitemap system===
â
[[Google Sitemap]] is an experiment in web crawling. Using Sitemaps to inform and direct our crawlers, we hope to expand our coverage of the web and improve the time to inclusion in our index. By placing a Sitemap-formatted file on your webserver, you enable our crawlers to find out what pages are present and which have recently changed, and to crawl your site accordingly.
+
[[Google Sitemap]] is an experiment in web crawling. Using Sitemaps to inform and direct our crawlers, we hope to expand our coverage of the web and improve the time to inclusion in our index. By placing a Sitemap-formatted file on your webserver, you enable our crawlers to find out what pages are present and which have recently changed, and to crawl your site accordingly. [http://sourceforge.net/projects/goog-sitemapgen Python], [http://www.tm-research.com/products/google-sitemap/sitemap-generator.html Perl] and [http://enarion.net/google/ Php] scripts are available for web-masters.
